MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the EH48 postcode area of Bathgate. It is necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 12:40pm to safely complete repairs on our underground cable network and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 4:00pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 12:27pm on Tuesday, 06 April 2021.
